website_summaries.verdict: Stainless steel gives you the crispy edges on your crust with more durability than aluminum pans.
pros: Stays looking new for a long time
cons: The stainless steel doesn't have quite the beauty for serving as ceramic and glass pans

customer_reviews.title: Not just for pies. I use it as a cat food dish.
customer_reviews.text: OK. I bought two. I use these for cat food to prevent "whisker fatigue." (Look it up.) They are bright stainless. Go in the dishwasher daily, Look brand new after several months. Couldn't be more pleased. As for pies? Don't know.
customer_reviews.author: Fussy Guy Garrett

customer_reviews.title: The right tool for the job!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a baker, only made one pie before I got this pan and I messed it up because it was a graham cracker crust in a disposable (floppy) aluminum pan. So I bought this pan - it's very solid and pressing a graham cracker crust into it was no problem. I have since made a perfect key lime pie. Twice.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Random

customer_reviews.title: Wow! I'm sold!
customer_reviews.text: It's attractive and feels like a quantum improvement from the old-style tin and aluminum ones. These days, seems like everything is lower quality but THIS is the exception. 5 Stars.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Good weight, solid pan
customer_reviews.text: I like this pan. It is very shiny and has a good weighted feel. I think it is going to also show scratches fairly easy. It actually reminds me of a collection plate in church.
customer_reviews.author: Customer Judy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Easy to Clean
customer_reviews.text: Lindy's brand is well made, looks nice, and very durable; worth the price I paid. I decided to go back to stainless steel, which my mother used when I was young, because it doesn't warp at high temperatures, doesn't dent when I drop it, and I if I burn something in it, I can scrub without worrying about damaging the finish. I've been given 2 sets of Teflon pans in the last 5 years and by the year mark they are scratched and no longer non-stick despite using proper utensils. With stainless steel, I can use any utensil and don't worry about how my kids, 2 with learning disabilities, are handling or cleaning them because they can't damage them.
customer_reviews.author: ARae

customer_reviews.title: Great Bargain!
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the best pie plates I have come across if you factor in the price, sturdiness, and looks. Highly recommend these, you will not find a better price for something like this. These are made in India. Enjoying mine.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: THEY GO IN THE DISHWASHER AND ARE USED FOR MANY THINGS.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Not planning to use it for conventional means so I don’t know if it’s easy to clean or if it bakes good pies but it looks sturdy and well made for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Anderson

customer_reviews.title: NEW ITEMS????  I think not!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my pie plates, an hour or so ago. My super power is noticing things/nit picking, and either it is failing me or these plates are used/been returned by someone else. There are scour marks on the inside bottom of both pans. And as there are none any where else, sides-lip or outside, I’m left with the conclusion the they’ve been scrubbed to clean them up for resale. As that they otherwise are in new like condition and untested, I will keep them and see how the work, and will update at that time.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Hewett

customer_reviews.title: Nicest pie pan I have ever used.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, shiny pan. Looks expensive. Easy to clean. Heavier than it looks. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Lindy's Pie Pan
customer_reviews.text: This is the best pie pan I have found.....I had a farberware classic and misplaced it during my move...did not realize it was old and could not be found....The Lindy's pan was a GREAT REPLACEMENT. LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: Superlooney

customer_reviews.title: Not a great pie pan
customer_reviews.text: This pan is too shallow to make a good pie, but will make an excellent cat dish. Cats like to eat from shallow dishes.
customer_reviews.author: jec

customer_reviews.title: she called it A Work of Art !!!
customer_reviews.text: have nothing in your house that you do not know to be beautiful or useful..... seems like good advice to me. this is both.... got this for a friend, she loves it! can't beat the price
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Bought to set keep ants away from my cat's feed bowl
customer_reviews.text: I read that if you put the pet's food in the center of a pie pan and pour water around it in the pie pan, it will drown any ants that try to get to the food. So far, so good. Not sure when my apartment is going to get around to spraying for ants again.
customer_reviews.author: Marcheta

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Pie Pans
customer_reviews.text: These pans help me to make great pies! They's just thick enough for the bottom crust to brown nicely and not burn. And the rim is wide enough to build a top edge that doesn't slip. They clean easily too. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Magic Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Finally baked a pie
customer_reviews.text: I made a pineapple cream pie in cream cheese crust. Loved it. Easy use; easy clean. Good pan.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: Great pie pans, great value. I don't know how they could make them any better.
customer_reviews.author: Willing to spend if it's worth it

customer_reviews.title: Cooks and cleans like a dream.
customer_reviews.text: It baked the crust crispy, sturdy, and cleaned up great.
customer_reviews.author: Frances D. Galantine

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Believe it or not, these were purchased for use as dog bowls for canned food. They fit into the dog's dry food bowls at feeding time. Excellent product and value.
customer_reviews.author: Catspaw

customer_reviews.title: Drop in a cherry pie!
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it a time or two but kit sure is pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Paul D. Lunde

customer_reviews.title: Very nice pie pan!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good pie pan and came across this one. I looked at the picture's and read a lot of reviews. It was a simple decision!😁 The size of this pan is just perfect for me. I live alone and don't need a bigger pan. I will soon be making a pie and it's going to really nice to use. I recommend that you give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Carol J Ford

customer_reviews.title: So happy...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to make a quiche and didn't have a pie pan of the right size. Initially, I picked this one because I liked the look. The stainless was very pretty! What I didn't expect, was that it is also the best non-stick surface I've used. I can't wait to bake again and I might need to get a few more of these...
customer_reviews.author: ChristineN

customer_reviews.title: Love these pans!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced some horribly discolored aluminum pans with these bright, shiny pans. Dishwasher won't turn them colors. They seem very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: K. White

customer_reviews.title: Really sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how thick and sturdy this pan was for the price. I have not used it yet, but the quality at first feel seems great!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was a little bigger as a package of cinnamon rolls will not all fit. Overall it is fantastic though so I can’t complain. Cleans very easy and cooks really well. Very happy with it, I’ll just order a bigger one for cinnamon rolls.
customer_reviews.author: LWalk

customer_reviews.title: stainless
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to feed my kittens but would be nice in the kitchen as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: i got this to try to get my parakeets to take a bath. So far no luck, but I remain hopeful. I will probably use it for baking at some point as well.
customer_reviews.author: Humble American

customer_reviews.title: as advertised,solid a lot for the price
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with the weight of these and the condition . this will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: enjoying life

customer_reviews.title: Lindy's 9-Inch Stainless Steel Pie Pan
customer_reviews.text: haven't used it yet. Looks good, study build, seems it would be very durable and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Wallace Lockhart

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: These are nice, heavy pie pans. I wanted metal that wasn't aluminum, and the price was very good. I'd buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Z

customer_reviews.title: I'd look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: That edge makes it hard to get a slice out without braking the crust off
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice, and not flimsy tin foil type pans found elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for crispy edges!
customer_reviews.text: The metal really helps the edges of crust crisp up without the nasty chemicals of non stick or aluminum.
customer_reviews.author: Kat T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and pies bake with a great crust. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Bryant

customer_reviews.title: A Sturdy and Durable Pie Pan for You
customer_reviews.text: The Lindy 9-Inch Stainless Steel Pie Pan has a shiny, mirror finish, and it is very easy to clean. The Pie Pan is somewhat heavier and more sturdy than I had expected, and it should be quite durable over many years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Bekoff

customer_reviews.title: Shiny
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and shiny. Probably scratches if you use metal. I'm gonna take care of mine.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: My mom asked me to order her a cheap pie pan. This thing is really nice. I just thought it was a good price.
customer_reviews.author: J J  Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Great Cat Dish
customer_reviews.text: Good for using to feed the cats. It is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Gottagetalife

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and well made.  Easy clean up!
customer_reviews.text: Really like these pie pans. Make a nice savory or dessert pie for your family. The bottom crust browns beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Kaye

customer_reviews.title: It is really a nice pan.
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my granddaughter. It is really a nice pan.
customer_reviews.author: E Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Unconventional purpose
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to feed the cats, and it is shallow to accommodate all three.
customer_reviews.author: CGKnits

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money! A good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Wife says they are great. Best mental pie pans she has ever used and cleans up easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Weimer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality!
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what I was looking for. Excellent quality & price
customer_reviews.author: CandyKK

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for kneading roti (chapathi) dough.
customer_reviews.text: The sides of the pan are thick stainless steel, however the center is very thin and bends easily. Sounds very tinny when kneading dough in it.
customer_reviews.author: Gardener

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend cooking products made of stainless steel.  They are sturdy, versatile
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike about this pie-pan. It doesn’t tarnish in a dishwasher, it’s sturdy and has many uses beyond simply making pies.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Really nice pan
customer_reviews.text: The pie pan arrived timely. I have only used it once, but I was surprised that the clean-up was so easy after baking a few cinnamon rolls. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Boyd

customer_reviews.title: definitely would buy again
customer_reviews.text: trying to move away from using aluminum... these are a nice heavy alternative
customer_reviews.author: looking for solutions

customer_reviews.title: Ideal As Dog Dishes!
customer_reviews.text: These wash up beautifully in the dishwasher. Perfect for my dog’s 🐕 food!!
customer_reviews.author: TwinsXTwo

customer_reviews.title: Great pan for such a small price!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the quality of these pie pans. Wasn't expecting how heavy and well made they would be for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great for pies.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for baking and is great quality. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Sommers

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: Very bright, shiny, strong, and easy to clean. What's not to love? Don't scratch it, and it will love you back. Arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: James 23

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: To fill the hole in my gas grill where the propane tank would normally be.
customer_reviews.author: mark k

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Stainless Steel Pie Plates!
customer_reviews.text: I love these Stainless Steel Pie Plates!!! I’ve baked in them and they are easy to clean! Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Gallegos

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. No issues with this purchase. Using the pans for versatile uses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: small
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought, the quality is average, a bit short
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: not as big and thick as I wanted but does the job
customer_reviews.author: Rudolph Billy Hennigan

customer_reviews.title: dishwasher safe and easy clean pie dish.
customer_reviews.text: I always purchase fancy and expensive pie dishes for long time but never satisfied for some reasons. I give up pretty pie dishes lately. Easy to stow and durable are the best for me. I realize stainless steel make pie outstanding than porcelain pretty pie dish. I placed order a pair pf this pie dishes on Amazon. Dishwasher safe and really high quality. I can just throw in the drawer ... I actually cook roast vegetable , pie and so many !
customer_reviews.author: SARAH

customer_reviews.title: Worked as expected!
customer_reviews.text: For years Ive been using glass/pyrex pie plates. Really have no issues with them. Ive read, however, that metal pans are better for preventing the dreaded "soggy bottom". I haven't tried this pan yet with a fruit pie where the liquid goes in to raw dough to be baked, however the first bake I did with these pans turned out just as good as my pyrex. They are lightweight and easy to clean. Im not sure this is the kind of item you gift to someone but I suppose if they are a baker. Please note that the surface does show scratches from cutting and serving the pie
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey George

customer_reviews.title: Pitted with  first use
customer_reviews.text: I used my pan once to make a chicken pot pie. I attached a picture to show the three black pits in it afterward.
customer_reviews.author: Janetta Jewell

customer_reviews.title: Great pie tins! No protruding parts!
customer_reviews.text: My older pies pans all have the little protruding handles which are nice, right up until you want to freeze the pie or the crust. Then they're weird to wrap and they take up more than their fair share of space. I like to make and freeze both crusts and pies, so these pans are perfect. And they're super sturdy! No more of those lousy aluminum tins. Ever.
customer_reviews.author: PacNW consumer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted not available in stores
customer_reviews.text: This item (I bought 2) was exactly the pie plate I wanted for baking. They have a nice feel to them and the pie I made to test it out came out great with a nice coloring. I couldn't find the same pie plates in the store and I was happy to see them online@Amazon. These also clean beautifully and have a great weight. I suggest you get them.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Pom-May

customer_reviews.title: Nice Pan But...
customer_reviews.text: The pie pan would be much better if it didn't have the indented ridge. The ridge causes a less than perfect fluted-edged pie crust.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Hobson

customer_reviews.title: pie pans that cook my beautiful pies perfectly
customer_reviews.text: At last, pie pans that cook my beautiful pies perfectly! Sturdy but light, and NOT aluminum (yayyy no Alzheimer's!!!).
customer_reviews.author: Salina

customer_reviews.title: Nice Pie Pan
customer_reviews.text: Lindy's 9 inch pie pans are well made and thick enough to give them some durability. You can run them through the dishwasher and they come out looking new. Recommend to potential purchasers.
customer_reviews.author: Royal James

customer_reviews.title: perfect shallow dog dish
customer_reviews.text: I use this pan as a dog dish. It fits perfectly in Molly's raised feeder. She has the dish that came with the feeder for her kibble and this Pie Pan/shallow dish for her sweet potatoes and green beans. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: carrie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for feeding 2 kitties
customer_reviews.text: Needed a bowl to feed 2 kitties at the same time and this bowl is perfect. Even a third kitty can join in!
customer_reviews.author: Stoke

customer_reviews.title: Great for Jingling Johnny Instrument
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these pans and screwed them together to create a type of drum on my homemade Jingling Johnny (stomp fiddle) instrument. When hit with drumsticks it has a good snare type sound when coupled with screen door springs. I can definitely attest to the durability of these. I have hit these pans very hard with drumsticks and they did not dent since they are made with thicker metal. Definitely great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: Damaged, used pan.
customer_reviews.text: This pan came to me used so I’ll be sending it back. It has a lot of circular scratches in the bottom and the very vent looks pitted.
customer_reviews.author: Shirl

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased 6 of these pans. They are a little smaller than what I'm used to with my glass pie pans, but I purchased these so I could freeze them without worrying about them breaking. I make Shephard's Pie in them in the fall and freeze. I take them out throughout the winter and bake for an easy, quick meal. They're worked out great!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty pie pan
customer_reviews.text: So I purchased this pie pan for a project I was working on that had nothing to do with baking pies. So I can't tell you how well pie crust bakes in this pan. What I can tell you is that this pan is extremely heavy and made of a high quality stainless steel. I imaging (again I didn't cook in it) that this pan will last a lifetime of use for baking.
customer_reviews.author: MBinNYC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cat food bowl
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a food bowl for my cats. It’s perfect! Nice and easy to clean. Have not baked a pie in it.
customer_reviews.author: amajyn

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful quality for the price :-)
customer_reviews.text: I got these on sale! They fit perfectly in my Rosewill convection oven. They are slightly magnetic, and seem well polished and of "clean" stainless material. (Which means that I am not likely to get undesirable metals in my food) Good deal! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: David Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Cheap pie pan
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper quality than I thought. I cut some slices of quiche I made with a knife and the material already started to chip after the first use.
customer_reviews.author: Christine O.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: If you want stainless pans (not "non-stick") these are the ones I'd recommend. Good quality pans of reasonably heavy, well polished stainless at a good price. I'd expect these pans to last virtually forever!
customer_reviews.author: John R Jackson Jr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Stainless Steel is the ONLY way to go. Pies fit perfect in this pan and so easy to clean, never have to worry about rust. After using this pan i will never buy anything but Stainless Steel.
customer_reviews.author: Jacknyd

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased with the quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a cat food dish to minimize whisker fatigue. I'm very pleased with the quality. I'll probably buy another one as an additional pet food dish and then a couple more for use as actual pie pans. The label said made in India; it's been my experience that they tend to make good stainless steel products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Pie Pan
customer_reviews.text: Bought the pie pan and made a pie. Worked great and the cleanup was easy. I would recommend it. Reminds me of my grandmother's pie pans.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Stuckey

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: We have eaten our watermelon in pie tins as long as I can remember. The used pie tins you get with a pie were not really strong enough to hold a hefty piece of watermelon. These sure do. Like 'em a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent heavy-gauge stainless steel pie pan!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pie pan! I absolutely love it!❤️ Heavy gauge stainless steel that is solid & won't warp or rust. The price was a steal! I would definitely buy again.👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Linda Shorter

customer_reviews.title: A great pie pan !!
customer_reviews.text: This pie pan makes great pies. The crust cooks evenly and holds a lot of filling. I'm going to order another !!
customer_reviews.author: Alec Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well in baking pie crusts. I especially like it is made from stainless steel rather than aluminum. Aluminum is bad for the body.
customer_reviews.author: jenniferk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan. I use it for quiche and even if I forget to grease the pan, it still comes out of the pan perfectly. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Donahue

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful items
customer_reviews.text: Got two of them for my quiches and meat pies. Excellent, sturdy and easy to clean, uniform in heat distribution. Do the exact job I got them for.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wenlock

customer_reviews.title: beautiful pan
customer_reviews.text: Real quality stainless steel, easy clean up in dishwasher, retains it's shine, perfect size for pie crust.
customer_reviews.author: xDebx

customer_reviews.title: Lindy's 9 inch stainless steel pie pan
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pie pan, very sturdy and great for baking. Cleans up good so pan should last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Big Joe

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted for camping dishes. Perfect! As far as for baking pie.. they seem a bit small to me. Actually, they are smaller than I expected for camping plates too, but the are nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Must have for baking pies
customer_reviews.text: Love it, made pecan pie and it came out perfect. No need to spray and it still comes out without sticking to the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: mbs

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Very durable. I imagined for the price it might be a flimsy pan. It is very sturdy and you can not beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Starkasm

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Super pie pans! I love the shiny finish and they hold plenty of filling. So easy to clean. I just pop them into the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: D Redding

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used it a few times now, for pies and such. Great pan. Even cooking, easy clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Bogart

customer_reviews.title: Great pie plate
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Good quality. I made a crustless pumpkin pie and it come out great! Works with crust too!
customer_reviews.author: Polish Chick

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pans! So glad I bought these and going to order more!
customer_reviews.author: Kitty H.

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate description
customer_reviews.text: This stainless steel pie plate is described as 9 inches in diameter (inside measurements) and it is actually 8 inches! I have returned it. A standard pie plate is 9 inches.
customer_reviews.author: K.D.

customer_reviews.title: Good weight
customer_reviews.text: Fine for all my toaster oven cooking. Round pan doesn't warp like trays can. Sticker needs to soak up some WD-40 to come off easily, abt an hour does it. Great pan.
customer_reviews.author: James McPeek

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy to provide long life
customer_reviews.text: Baked 2 pies. Both are very good. Easy to use, easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Amazodf georgen Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice stainless steel pie pans
customer_reviews.text: Really nice stainless steel pie pans at a good price. Will be buying more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Roulette

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I plan on using it as an ash pan under a 6.5 inch colander that I intend to burn charcoal briquettes in.
customer_reviews.author: TWKane

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I love these pans and use them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Cathryn Adger

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pie pan that cleans so well in a normal basic dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: waterlove

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to use and worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Love it, and th 10" is great as well. Copy of one I dad for years...easy to handle and easier to deal the two crust pie!
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Martin

product_meta.title: Lindy's Stainless Steel 9 inch pie pan, Silver
product_meta.description: Color:SilverYou’ll love the Lindy’s 9-inch stainless steel pie pan. Heavyweight material has even heat distribution and allows crusts to brown nicely crisp without burning. Highly polished mirror-like finish prevents crusts from sticking to the pan and makes cleanup easy. Can go from the freezer directly to the oven without damaging the pan. Doesn’t tarnish and wear like aluminum so it always stays looking like new and will last for years.
feature_bullets: Heavyweight durable material has even heat distribution. Highly polished mirror-like finish prevents crusts from sticking to the pan. Doesn't tarnish and wear like aluminum so it always stays looking like new. Can go directly from freezer to the oven without damaging the pan. Measures 9-3/4" wide by 1-1/2" deep
Highly polished mirror-like finish prevents crusts from sticking to the pan
Doesn’t tarnish and wear like aluminum so it always stays looking like new
Can go directly from freezer to the oven without damaging the pan

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
